Name: Meu
About the game: Meu is a new type of body language based communication. Meu lets you explore, record and share your body movements along with unique psychedelic filters and adaptive music that you control with your movements. You can send and receive dances, hugs and even secret handshakes. Create your own body language communication with friends who have VR or share your moves as animated gifs.
